scripts.test:login: env-cmd npx wdio run wdio.conf.ts --spec src/tests/login.test.ts
scripts.test:forms: env-cmd npx wdio run wdio.conf.ts --spec src/tests/forms.test.ts
scripts.test:home: env-cmd npx wdio run wdio.conf.ts --spec src/tests/home.test.ts
scripts.test:all: env-cmd npx wdio run wdio.conf.ts --spec src/tests/**/*.test.ts
